EmailTemplate.name: 3PT - Blog Post
EmailTemplate.subject: What Is The Bane Of The Software Defined Universe?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Software Defined Latency Gilt Group in New York Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, We are entering a very exciting and progressive time. It seems we are moving away from hardware to a fully software defined universe, opening the door for new levels of innovation. With this change however, comes a large growing pain, namely software defined latency. In this blog post our founder Shmuel Kliger addresses this growing pain, including how we can confront the feeling that "IT is in chaos." Read Here! <http://vmturbo.com/blog/bane-software-defined-universe-software-defined-latency/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=blog> <http://www.vmturbo.com/downloads?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=blog> Downloads <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=blog> White Papers <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=blog> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
